title: WERE ONYINYE DI MMA KELEE VA

content.intro:
Ktuniem umunnem k 'anyi nyenu Chineke
Ezi onyinye ee, vere onyinye di mma Kelee ya
content.refrain: Were onyinye dim ma kelee ya Kelee Chukwu
verses: Ya kere gi ya n'eche gi- Ezi Chukwu
Yan'edu gi n'uzo nile - Ezi Chukwu
Ya n'enye di ya n'enye nwunye- Ezi Chukwu
Yan'enye nwa, ya n'enye ego- Ezi Chukwu
Yan'enye anwu, ya n'enye mmiri- Ezi Chukwu
Yan'enye olu, ya n'enye ike Ezi Chukwu
Yan'enye uburu na ma akwukwo- Ezi Chukwu
Yan'azo gi n'onya ndi iro- Ezi Chukwu
